components.description:
A shop that is generally open for longer hours than a regular supermarket, sometimes 24 hours per day.

Sells a range of goods from snacks, meals, hygiene products and household items.
components.title: Convenience Store

description:
A shop that is generally open for longer hours than a regular supermarket, sometimes 24 hours per day.

Sells a range of goods from snacks, meals, hygiene products and household items.
title: Convenience Store

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Building and map symbols

emoji_net_data.name: convenience store

bn:00084198v: Make by combining materials and parts
To create something by combining or assembling materials or parts or by changing it.
To form by combining materials or parts.
(transitive) to form by combining materials or parts.
To build or form (something) by assembling parts.
To form or formulate in the mind.

bn:00087441v: Inhabit or live in; be an inhabitant of
To fill with people or supply with inhabitants.
To supply with inhabitants; to people.
To have permanent residence somewhere, to inhabit, to reside.
To plant with inhabitants; to colonize; to people.

bn:00075277n: A supermarket, a large form of the traditional grocery store, is a self-service shop offering a wide variety of food and household products, organized into aisles.
A large self-service grocery store selling groceries and dairy products and household goods
Large form of the traditional grocery store
A self-service food store with grocery, meat, and produce departments with a high turnover.
A large self-service store that sells groceries and, usually, medications, household goods and/or clothing.

bn:00071230n: The commodities purchased from storeswomen carrying home shopping didn't give me a second glance"
A retailer or shop is a business that presents a selection of goods or services and offers to sell them to customers for money or other goods.

bn:00013722n: A building, esp. one of large size or imposing appearance.
A structure that has a roof and walls and stands more or less permanently in one place
Closed structure with walls and a roof.
A building is a man-made structure with a roof and walls standing more or less permanently in one place.
Structure with a roof and walls, such as a house or factory.
A closed structure with walls and a roof.
A building; a structure; an architectural fabric, especially an imposing one; a large or fine building, public or private.
Man-made structure with a roof and walls standing more or less permanently in one place
A building to which there is free access by the public and which is available for the use of a community.

bn:00044896n: A place where people who are ill or injured are treated and taken care of by doctors and nurses.
A place where sick or injured people are cared for, especially a small hospital; sickhouse.
A health facility where patients receive treatment
A hospital is a health care institution providing patient treatment with specialized staff and equipment.
A place where sick or injured people are cared for, especially a small hospital.

bn:00022327n: A convenience store, whether or not it is on a corner.

A small retail store, often in a residential area, that carries a limited selection of items such as staples, sweets, newspapers, and other everyday items which is open long hours for the convenience of shoppers.
Small store that stocks a range of everyday items
A food-oriented retailer that is well located, is open long hours, and carries a moderate number of items.

A small retail store, often in a residential area, that carries a limited selection of items such as staples, junk food, and drugstore items, and which is open long hours for the convenience of shoppers.
A store selling a limited variety of food and pharmaceutical items; open long hours for the convenience of customers

A convenience store, small grocery store, or corner shop, is a small store that stocks a range of everyday items such as groceries, snack foods, candy, toiletries, soft drinks, tobacco products, and newspapers.

bn:00044994n: A dwelling that serves as living quarters for one or more families
A structure serving as an abode of human beings.
A human-built dwelling with enclosing walls, a floor, and a roof

A house is a building that functions as a home for humans or other creatures, including simple dwellings ranging from rudimentary huts of nomadic tribes and complex structures composed of many systems.
The abode of a human being, their place of residence.

apple_vendor_description: Apple's convenience store emoji presents a charming, compact building rendered with Apple‚Äôs characteristic glossy 3D shading and subtle highlights that evoke a welcoming atmosphere.  On Apple devices, its clean lines and softly rounded corners suggest a readily accessible place for everyday needs.  This emoji often signifies quick errands, local shops, or a sense of community and convenience in digital messages.
